abstract: Apple’s stock took a brief roller-coaster ride after a “citizen journalist” said Steve Jobs had been rushed to the hospital with chest pains.
snippet: Apple’s stock took a brief roller-coaster ride after a “citizen journalist” said Steve Jobs had been rushed to the hospital with chest pains.
lead_paragraph: Apple’s stock took a brief roller coaster ride this morning after a CNN “citizen journalist” wrote that an “insider” reported that Steve Jobs had been rushed to the hospital with chest pains.
